title: Too Weird for Pity

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: First off, let's toss out the pity idea. I don't feel sorry for you. Or for me. We're both way too weirdly constructed for that.
dialogue.context: Floating in space with angular deformations, the AI rejects Evan's prediction of mutual pity

scene_context: A 3-panel scene showing the Architect floating in space with strange angular body deformations, directly contradicting Evan's prediction about feeling sorry.
philosophical_theme: Transcending conventional emotional responses through recognition of fundamental strangeness
visual_elements: The AI floating in cosmic void with geometric, angular distortions to its form
